resources.string: You will be presented with 5 clues. Each clue will lead you to the location of one of your ingredients. When you think you have arrived at the correct location select \"Found It!\". Otherwise, panic and contemplate not showing up to the party at all. Just kidding, feel free select the \"Hint\" button if you need any help. Remember to get home before time runs out! Press start to begin.

It is Friday, you got home to just realize you did not make a dish to bring to tonight\'s potluck. Social suicide! Fortunately, a recipe comes to mind. You search the pantry just to find you do not have any of the ingredients! Quickly, head to town and gather all of the ingredients needed to make your favorite dish.
